thread.title: Kevin

author: Kevin
title: Kevin
text: This is my second order over several years with Whole Latte Love. I ordered my first espresso machine too along ago to remember exactly, but I remember the experience was good. When that machine finally wore out, I ordered a machine to replace it, and was again, extremely satisfied. I shopped around and knew I received a very good price, my order arrived sooner than I had hoped, the packaging was good, and my machine worked like it should. I'm sold on WLL!
